title: TVS ropes in former Tata Motors Associate VP Madhu Singh for electric mobility division
description: Earlier in January this year, TVS had appointed Venkat Viswanathan - an associate professor of Mechanical Engineering at Carnegie Mellon University - as the technical advisor for its electric mobility division to draw on his expertise in advance battery technology.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
